page.title: 12Crops grown in Rhenigidale
page.content: {Potatoes}In Rhenigidale we grow nearly all the potatoes that we need throughout the year. Bags of seed potatoes are bought and these are planted in lazy beds and covered with soil, manure and fertiliser. Hopefully around Autumn there will be a good crop of potatoes.{Lazy beds}are long, flat, rectangular, raised mounds of earth made years ago by digging a ditch all round and piling the earth in the middle. All the vegetables and corn are sown in these. {Hay}Some of the grass is spread with fertiliser in the Spring and by Autumn there is a good crop of grass. This is cut by scythe and dried on{hay racks.} These are long tent shaped structures made out of fencing posts and wire. The grass is hung on each strand of the wire, covered with a net and left to dry.
